Package becker.io

The io library provides simplified input and output facilities for beginning programmers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConsoleInput ConsoleInput extends TextInput to provide services useful for dealing with error-prone humans interacting via a keyboard.
SPrintWriter A wrapped version of PrintWriter that does not throw checked exceptions and is useful for writing formatted representations of primitive types to files.
SScanner A wrapped version of Java's simple text scanner which can parse primitive types and strings using regular expressions.
TextInput A TextInput object may be used to easily read text from an input stream.
TextOutput TextOutput is almost identical to System.out except that it also has a constructor which takes a filename, allowing easy output to a file.
 

Exception Summary
SFileNotFoundException A simplified FileNotFoundException that is not checked (so beginning programmers don't have to know how to catch it) and also reports the current working directory to aid in debugging.
 

Error Summary
IOError Indicate that an error has occurred while reading text.
 

Package becker.io Description

The io library provides simplified input and output facilities for beginning programmers.
